name: Earthguard
effect: While adjacent to an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_, increase this creature's _Guard_ by 1.

name: Stone Shell
effect: This creature begins the encounter with _Stone Armor_.

name: Natural Weaponry
effect: All of this creature's Weapons are Natural and may not be Disarmed. In exchange, they lose the Thrown property.

name: Nimble
effect: Twice per _Round_ you may Move 1 [_Safe_ 2] at the start of a _Phase_.

name: Slothful
effect: This creature is slow. Increase the cost of Move Techniques by 1 AP.

name: Stable
effect: Reduce all _Forced Movement_ effects against you by X, where X is the listed Stable.
